languages.text: "Верно, Ваша Светлость. Мне оказана высокая честь быть смотрителем этого достойного дворца, и, по случаю празднества, я надзираю за приготовлениями к церемонии".

traits.locale_text: "И ваш покорный слуга, ваша милость. Мне оказана высокая честь быть смотрителем этого достойного дворца, и, по случаю празднества, я надзираю за приготовлению к церемонии".

languages.text: "I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."
languages.original_text: "Верно, Ваша Светлость. Мне оказана высокая честь быть смотрителем этого достойного дворца, и, по случаю празднества, я надзираю за приготовлениями к церемонии".

traits.locale_text: "And your humble servant, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was given the high honor of being the steward of this eminent palace, and for the celebration, I am overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

"And your humble servant, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was given the high honor of being the steward of this eminent palace, and for the celebration, I am overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

"I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

"I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

"I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

languages.text: 「そのとおりです、陛下。この素晴らしい宮殿で、それも陛下の即位に際し、幹事を務めさせていただき大変光栄にございます。式典の準備を陰から拝見しております」
languages.original_text: "I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりです、陛下。この素晴らしい宮殿で、それも陛下の即位に際し、幹事を務めさせていただき大変光栄にございます。式典の準備を陰から拝見しております」

languages.text: “确实如此，大人。我无比荣幸能担任这座显赫宫殿的管家之职，同时也将主持继任颂典的一切筹备工作。”
languages.original_text: "I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: “也是您谦卑的仆人，大人。我无比荣幸能担任这座显赫宫殿的管家之职，同时也将主持继任颂典的一切筹备工作。”

languages.text: «Efectivamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Me ha sido concedido el singular honor de regentar este insigne palacio y, con motivo de la ascensión de mi{mf|lord|lady}, de supervisar los preparativos para la ceremonia».
languages.original_text: "I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: «Y su humilde sirviente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Me ha sido concedido el singular honor de regentar este insigne palacio y, con motivo de la ascensión de mi{mf|lord|lady}, de supervisar los preparativos para la ceremonia».

languages.text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai reçu l'insigne honneur d'être nommé intendant de cet éminent palais et superviserai donc les préparatifs pour la cérémonie de votre accession au pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: "I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: « Et votre humble serviteur, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai reçu l'insigne honneur d'être nommé intendant de cet éminent palais et superviserai donc les préparatifs pour la cérémonie de votre 'accession au pouvoir. »

languages.text: "Das habe ich in der Tat, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Mir wurde die hohe Ehre zuteil, Truchsess dieses prächtigen Palastes sein zu dürfen, und anlässlich des Aufstiegs Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} überwache ich die Vorbereitungen für die Zeremonie."
languages.original_text: "I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: "Und Euer demütiger Diener, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mir wurde die hohe Ehre zuteil, Truchsess dieses prächtigen Palastes sein zu dürfen, und anlässlich des Aufstiegs Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} überwache ich die Vorbereitungen für die Zeremonie."

languages.text: "Evet, bana verildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu mümtaz sarayın idarecisi olma şerefine nail oldum ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin cülusu vesilesiyle yapılan törenin hazırlıklarını ben gözeteceğim."
languages.original_text: "I have indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have been given the high honour of being steward of this eminent palace, and on the occasion of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s accession, I will be overseeing the preparations for the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, bana verildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu mümtaz sarayın idarecisi olma şerefine nail oldum ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin vusulü vesilesiyle yapılan törenin hazırlıklarını ben gözeteceğim."
